recipes.name: Chile Relleno
recipes.description: This is a mexican food. Made with poblano peppers stuffed with cheese. It's then dipped in whipped egg whites and fried. Served in a red salsa and your favorite sides or toppings! And its delicious :)
recipes.ingredients: 4 Poblano Peppers, 1.5 cups of cheese, 3 eggs, oil
recipes.instructions: Place the peppers in an air fryer at 400Â°F for 5 minutes. If charred, transfer them to a plastic bag (or Tupperware) to sweat for 20 minutes. Beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form, then fold in the egg yolks. Heat oil for frying. Peel the peppers, stuff them with cheese, and secure them with toothpicks. Dip the peppers in flour, then coat them in the egg mixture, and fry. Serve with tomato salsa and sides of your choice.

recipes.name: Pupusas
recipes.description: This is Salvadorian food. It's made using corn flour and stuffed with your favorite fillin gs. Served with a slaw and red salsa along with any additional toppings you'd like.
recipes.ingredients: 1lb of maseca (corn flour), 1tsp of chicken knorr, 1/2 tsp of salt, 2tbs butter, 3c hot water, 1c cool water, filling of your choice
recipes.instructions: Mix all the dry ingredients. Work in the butter with your hands, then add all the hot water and mix. If more water is needed for consistency, slowly add the cool water. Once the dough is set, form it into balls and fill them with the fillings of your choice. Gently shape each ball into a disk and cook. Serve with salsa and slaw.

recipes.name: Mango Claw
recipes.description: This is a mango Whiteclaw that was dipped in chamoy sauce and tajin for extra umph.
recipes.instructions: Grab your white claw, pineapple also works. Then dip the rim in the chamoy sauce followed by the tajin. Enjoy.
